name: Unión Pequeños Agricultores y Ganaderos Almería
goal:
Defensa de agricultores y ganaderos. Frutas y Hortalizas Europeas
. compromiso con cuestiones de mantenimiento del medio rural

interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Single market, Youth
euInitiatives:
Medio Ambiente. PAC y OCM
Ley por el cambio climático.
